name: DailyGuyTalk
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A daily audio focusing on men's health, relationships and outdoor adventure. We'll also talk about things that will help guys connect more and other topics around mental well-being. Hosted by Scott Colby, the founder of Guys Who Hike, his mission is to create a brotherhood and bring awareness to men’s mental health issues through hiking, fitness and other outdoor adventures.

Disclaimer: This skill may talk about topics such as mental health, depression and suicide. This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
